job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggt about walnutltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtour missionltstronggtltpgtltpgtwe believe that nobody should struggle financially to receive healthcare every year families in the united states declare bankruptcy due to large medical bills people should not have their lives destroyed because they cant afford something they require to survive at walnut were on a mission to change this number from bankruptcies per year to ltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtwhat we doltstronggtltpgtltpgtwalnut is a fintech company that expands financial access to healthcare were building a pointofsale embedded lending platform that makes healthcare more affordable for patients by breaking up large medical bills into small monthly payments this helps patients actually afford healthcare and helps healthcare providers capture more revenue and increase collections were backed by prominent investors including gradient ventures googles aifocused venture fund plaid afore capital ventures newark venture partners supernode ventures and othersltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt about the roleltstronggtltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtoverviewltstronggtltpgtltpgtas our first software engineer you will be an integral member of a small fastpaced engineering team building our core product and scaling it as the company grows as our first hire this is a tremendous opportunity to influence the growth of a new team and build a novel and impactful technology that improves the financial wellbeing of patientsampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt what youll doltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtas an early member of our engineering team you will work directly with the cto and head of product to spec design and build the core product functionalityltligtltligtspecifically youll work on expanding the functionality of our live mvp to optimize the user onboarding flow enhance authentication integrate with rdparty data providers we use for underwriting decisioning build out the decision engine itself and much moreltligtltligtbe part of our weekly product development cycle where youll convert product requirements into functionalityltligtltligtdevelop product intuition by spending time with our users and increasingly take ownership of coming up with product requirementsltligtltligtsolve problems you dont know how to solve youll encounter challenges we havent yet come across yet and when the time comes youll think through problems evaluate approaches and teach yourself whatever is neededltligtltligtlay a solid foundation for the product to scale keep our technical debt in check and help us hire a team of incredible engineersampnbspltligtltligthave something you want to learn or accomplish in this role tell us about it we want to give you the best career opportunity youve ever hadltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt what were looking forltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt years of experience as a software engineerltligtltligthustle ampamp gritampnbspwillingness and desire to take on personal responsibility for the business as a whole and figure it out whether its in your exact functional lane or notltligtltligtexcitement and passion for expanding financial access to healthcareampnbspltligtltligtexperience with java a relational database react or a comparable frontend framework and building fullstack web appsltligtltligta great understanding of how restful services and gradle worksltligtltligtour full tech stack includes docker spring gradle hibernate expressjs nextjs amazon web services java nn pythonltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggt what we offerltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt competitive compensation and equity we will pay you for your level of experienceltligtltligt competitive health benefits medical dental vision ltligtltligtunlimited vacation with a minimum of days off per yearltligtltligt new equipment for you to do your best workltligtltligt opportunity to make a significant contribution to a product thats already transforming how people pay for healthcareltligtltligt an organization that supports learning and development we will find mentors to help you level up provide you the stretch opportunities and make resources available to help you growltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtinterested in applying get in touch roshanhellowalnutcomltstronggtltpgt
